Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 3 spaces in a direction of the Wailer's choice, or 1 space on a successful save.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The Wailer gains stealth. Mark a foe in range 3.
Actions.Mark: At the end of the marked character's next turn, they are still in range 3 of the Wailer, the Wailer may teleport adjacent to them and deal [D]. Then this mark ends.
